comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Claude Graham White   British pilot  Farman biplane
Royal Aero Club pilot #6 ( 26 Apr 1910)   Aero Club of France Pilot # 30 ( 4 Jan 1910) 
Photo shows White landing on Executive Avenue , between the State, War,  Navy and White House       Washington, D.C. October 14,1910.
"The object of the trip was to make a personal visit by aeroplane to the Army and Navy officers at the State, War , and Navy building" { Washington Post October 15,1910}
